3718.verse: وَٱضْرِبْ|And set forth|108|122|10751$لَهُم|to them|72|99|98$مَّثَلاً|an example|94|121|261$أَصْحَـٰبَ|(of the) companions|154|181|4057$ٱلْقَرْيَةِ|(of) the city,|107|134|4197$إِذْ|when|55|68|1198$جَآءَهَا|came to it|88|317|13106$ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ|the Messengers,|129|358|9808$

3719.verse: إِذْ|When|57|76|1198$أَرْسَلْنَآ|We sent|82|120|1342$إِلَيْهِمُ|to them|72|110|5944$ٱثْنَيْنِ|two (Messengers)|139|178|6117$فَكَذَّبُوهُمَا|but they denied both of them,|221|240|12301$فَعَزَّزْنَا|so We strengthened them|192|210|14453$بِثَالِثٍ|with a third,|101|138|14454$فَقَالُوٓاْ|and they said,|115|152|4596$إِنَّآ|`Indeed, We|104|141|120$إِلَيْكُم|to you|66|84|2453$مُّرْسَلُونَ|(are) Messengers.`|148|148|14455$

3721.verse: قَالُواْ|They said,|89|100|101$رَبُّنَا|`Our Lord,|89|112|1253$يَعْلَمُ|knows|61|84|742$إِنَّآ|that we|72|95|120$إِلَيْكُمْ|to you|66|89|2453$لَمُرْسَلُونَ|(are) surely Messengers,|184|195|14457$

3723.verse: قَالُوٓاْ|They said,|89|97|101$إِنَّا|`Indeed, we|102|118|120$تَطَيَّرْنَا|[we] see an evil omen|167|183|14458$بِكُمْۖ|from you.|83|99|2564$لَئِن|If|52|68|4795$لَّمْ|not|42|58|63$تَنتَهُواْ|you desist,|93|101|7197$لَنَرْجُمَنَّكُمْ|surely, we will stone you,|189|218|14459$وَلَيَمَسَّنَّكُم|and surely will touch you|185|243|14460$مِّنَّا|from us|69|127|1169$عَذَابٌ|a punishment|108|137|72$أَلِيمٌ|painful.`|76|76|93$

3724.verse: قَالُواْ|They said,|89|97|101$طَـٰٓئِرُكُم|`Your evil omen|125|141|13240$مَّعَكُمْۚ|(be) with you!|115|131|121$أَئِن|Is it because|106|122|14461$ذُكِّرْتُمۚ|you are admonished?|159|175|14462$بَلْ|Nay,|50|58|848$أَنتُمْ|you|54|150|796$قَوْمٌ|(are) a people|114|307|4788$مُّسْرِفُونَ|transgressing.`|121|218|6573$

3725.verse: وَجَآءَ|And came|85|96|7815$مِنْ|from|50|71|53$أَقْصَا|(the) farthest end|141|162|13380$ٱلْمَدِينَةِ|(of) the city|102|123|6709$رَجُلٌ|a man|69|90|3777$يَسْعَىٰ|running.|77|98|13381$قَالَ|He said,|73|84|309$يَـٰقَوْمِ|`O my People!|115|204|513$ٱتَّبِعُواْ|Follow|77|254|1471$ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ|the Messengers.|129|218|2247$

3726.verse: ٱتَّبِعُواْ|Follow|77|95|1471$مَن|(those) who|101|137|76$لَّا|(do) not|75|111|30$يَسْــَٔلُكُمْ|ask (of) you|101|137|14463$أَجْرًا|any payment,|111|147|4008$وَهُم|and they|79|97|256$مُّهْتَدُونَ|(are) rightly guided.|152|152|5781$

3727.verse: وَمَا|And what|83|89|46$لِىَ|(is) for me|89|102|14464$لَآ|(that) not|87|100|30$أَعْبُدُ|I worship|80|93|8337$ٱلَّذِى|the One Who|107|120|138$فَطَرَنِى|created me|95|108|8538$وَإِلَيْهِ|and to Whom|108|114|2165$تُرْجَعُونَ|you will be returned?|158|158|297$

3728.verse: ءَأَتَّخِذُ|Should I take|108|121|14465$مِن دُونِهِۦٓ|besides Him|116|142|4463$ءَالِهَةً|gods?|72|98|5479$إِن|If|44|70|225$يُرِدْنِ|intends for me|115|141|14466$ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ|the Most Gracious|140|153|1415$بِضُرٍّ|any harm|81|92|5467$لَّا|not|42|63|30$تُغْنِ|will avail|75|96|7501$عَنِّى|[from] me|85|106|1612$شَفَـٰعَتُهُمْ|their intercession|134|155|14467$شَيْــًٔا|(in) anything,|110|131|472$وَلَا|and not|71|82|25$يُنقِذُونِ|they (can) save me.|156|156|14468$

3730.verse: إِنِّىٓ|Indeed, I|80|118|312$ءَامَنتُ|[I] have believed|133|209|8301$بِرَبِّكُمْ|in your Lord,|103|179|3615$فَٱسْمَعُونِ|so listen to me.`|131|169|14469$

3732.verse: bimaA⚓Of how⚓REL|LEM:maA★gafara⚓has forgiven⚓ V|PERF|LEM:gafara|ROOT:gfr|3MS★liY⚓me⚓ PRON|1S★rab~iY⚓my Lord⚓ N|LEM:rab~|ROOT:rbb|M|NOM★wajaEalaniY⚓and placed me⚓ V|PERF|LEM:jaEala|ROOT:jEl|3MS★mina⚓among⚓ P|LEM:min★{lomukoramiyna⚓the honored ones.`⚓ N|PASS|PCPL|(IV)|LEM:m~ukoramuwn|ROOT:krm|MP|GEN★

3718.verse: And present to them an example: the people of the city, when the messengers came to it -

3719.verse: When We sent to them two but they denied them, so We strengthened them with a third, and they said, "Indeed, we are messengers to you."

3720.verse: They said, "You are not but human beings like us, and the Most Merciful has not revealed a thing. You are only telling lies."

3721.verse: They said, "Our Lord knows that we are messengers to you,

3722.verse: And we are not responsible except for clear notification."

3723.verse: They said, "Indeed, we consider you a bad omen. If you do not desist, we will surely stone you, and there will surely touch you, from us, a painful punishment."

3724.verse: They said, "Your omen is with yourselves. Is it because you were reminded? Rather, you are a transgressing people."

3725.verse: And there came from the farthest end of the city a man, running. He said, "O my people, follow the messengers.

3726.verse: Follow those who do not ask of you [any] payment, and they are [rightly] guided.

3727.verse: And why should I not worship He who created me and to whom you will be returned?

3728.verse: Should I take other than Him [false] deities [while], if the Most Merciful intends for me some adversity, their intercession will not avail me at all, nor can they save me?

3729.verse: Indeed, I would then be in manifest error.

3730.verse: Indeed, I have believed in your Lord, so listen to me."

3731.verse: It was said, "Enter Paradise." He said, "I wish my people could know

3732.verse: Of how my Lord has forgiven me and placed me among the honored."
